availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Cooper (Lincoln County politician and county attorney)

body.p: Lincoln County attorney and politician. Lincoln County, Kentucky native. Married to Pauline Karr Cooper in Madison County on November 12, 1861. Father of Lucy A. Cooper and Fannie P. Cooper. Attorney in Lincoln County in 1860. Served in the House of Representatives for the Commonwealth of Kentucky for Lincoln County from 1861 to 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 8.

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 91B, 92A.
